# sqm-portal-protected-route



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                   | Attribute                    | Description                                                                                                    | Type      | Default                |
| -------------------------- | ---------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ---------------------- |
| `redirectTo`               | `redirect-to`                | Redirect participants to this path they are not logged in.                                                     | `string`  | `"/"`                  |
| `redirectToUnverified`     | `redirect-to-unverified`     | Redirect participants to this path when email verification is required but they have not verified their email. | `string`  | `"/emailVerification"` |
| `requireEmailVerification` | `require-email-verification` |                                                                                                                | `boolean` | `false`                |
